org.lsmp.djep.djep.diffRules
Class DivideDiffRule

java.lang.Object
  org.lsmp.djep.djep.diffRules.DivideDiffRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiffRulesI
public class DivideDiffRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiffRulesI

Diffrentiates a division with respect to var. diff(y/z,x) -> (diff(y,x)*z-y*diff(z,x))/(z*z)
